name: Set In Stone (Sn4pi)
description:
A broken man descends into the rivers of time to right his past wrongs.

SUMMARY

Set in Stone is a Roguelite without perma-death. Death sends you back to the start of the game with all of your items, so technically, you can’t lose.

CONTROLS

WASD to move Mouse to aim

CREDITS

Code - Sn4pi

Music and Sounds - Junkyard Dog ( https://soundcloud.com/jnkdog )

Artwork, Design - Peringo
